text: Bobby Bolt (born April 29, 1987 in Thunder Bay, Ontario) is a Canadian professional ice hockey player who was drafted 127th by the Anaheim Ducks in the 2005 NHL Entry Draft. ==Career statistics== Regular season Playoffs Season Team League GP G A Pts PIM GP G A Pts PIM 2003-04 London Knights OHL 8 1 0 1 2 -- -- -- -- -- 2004-05 Kingston Frontenacs OHL 67 11 14 25 92 -- -- -- -- -- 2005-06 Kingston Frontenacs OHL 68 5 10 15 89 6 0 0 0 4 2006-07 Kingston Frontenacs OHL 62 22 28 50 70 5 0 6 6 4 2006-07 Portland Pirates AHL 5 1 1 2 2 -- -- -- -- -- 2007-08 Augusta Lynx ECHL 62 15 11 26 45 5 1 0 1 7 2007-08 Portland Pirates AHL 4 0 0 0 0 -- -- -- -- -- 2008-09 Bakersfield Condors ECHL 11 0 1 1 23 5 0 2 2 13 ==Other websites== * Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian ice hockey left wingers Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:Portland Pirates players Category:Sportspeople from Thunder Bay
title: Bobby Bolt
